scripts.test: env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha -- -u bdd $(find tests -name '*.js')
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run zip && aws configure set default.region us-east-2 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name testing-an-already-existing --zip-file fileb://../Archive.zip publish-layer-version --layer-name testing-an-already-existing --description v2.0.0 --content []
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run zip && aws configure set default.region us-east-1 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name testing-an-already-existing  --zip-file fileb://../Archive.zip --publish
